title: On-base activities
text:
Events are as accurate as possible at press time. Since times or event schedules can change, please verify events before attending. Japan 
Visit Atsugi MWR at http://tinyurl.com/3dozakn or on Facebook at http://tinyurl.com/3eytb9c . Athletics July 3, Independence Day 1K Swim, Outdoor Pool; 7 p.m., Red, White & Glow Run, Ranger Park, register 6 p.m.; July 10, Captain’s Cup Golf, coaches’ meeting at 11:30 a.m. at the Golf Course July 7, roster by July 3; July 20-Sept. 11, eight-week weight loss incentive program, Ranger Gym, register July 6-10; Wed. & Thu., 4-5 p.m., muay thai for ages 5-15, $50 month, Halsey Gym. Events on Independence Day July 4, 3:40 p.m., parade with Mercury Winds Marching Band; 4 p.m., event starts at Taylor Field and includes arts and crafts, photo booth, food, canned beer sale and more, 4-6 p.m., free food and soft drinks, provided by MWR, 4:30 p.m., Mercury Winds Marching Band performance; 5 p.m., family games start every 30 minutes; 5 p.m., Nerd Rock Band (‘80s music); 5:45 p.m., DJ; 6:15 p.m., Van Halen tribute band; 7:45 p.m., fireworks; 8:30 p.m., Movie Under the Stars at Alliance Park. Bowling July 4, 11 a.m.-7 p.m., BowInanza!, rent a lane for $10/hour includes shoes; July 26, 5-10 p.m., Celebrate Parents’ Day, $26 pizza and bowling special; Aug. 3, 10, 17, 24 & 31, 11 a.m.-1 p.m., Beat the Heat Mondays, $1.25 games and $1 shoe rental. Child and Youth Programs, 264-3588 July 20-31, session 3, register July 15-17; Aug. 3-14, session 4, register July 29-31. Single Sailor Liberty, 264-4750 Aug. 15-16, 7:30 a.m.-midnight, Tokyo SummerSonic & New Sanno Hotel overnight, $263.20 E1-E4, $292.44 E5+, sign up by July 25. ITT Tours, 264-3786/3770; http://tinyurl.com/9ex5eml ; www.facebook.com/atsugimwr July 4, 7:30 a.m.-4:30 p.m., Tsukiji Fish market & Ginza sightseeing, $32 adults, $26 ages 6-11, $20 ages 5 & younger; July 5, 8:45 a.m.-5:30 p.m., New Sanno brunch & Hiratsuka Tanabata Star Festival, $40 adults, $27 ages 4-12, $22 ages 3 & younger; 7 a.m.-6 p.m., Kamogawa Sea World, $25 transportation only; July 11, 6 a.m.-8 p.m., transportation to Nikko Edo Wonderland, $40; 10 a.m.-6:30 p.m., Ziplining at Tarzania Adventure Sports & Park, $50 ages 18+; July 12, 7:30 a.m.-9:30 p.m., Canyoning at Minakami, $115 ages 13+; 8:30 a.m.-6 p.m., Yunessun Hakone Spa, $37 adults, $32 ages 3-11, $20 ages 2 & younger; July 15 & Aug. 12, noon-12:30 p.m., mandatory Mount Fuji safety briefing, Cinema 77; July 17, 3 a.m.-11:30 p.m., Kyoto Gion Festival, $80 adults, $70 ages 6-11, $60 ages 3-5, $10 Blue Jacket; July 18, 5 a.m.-8:30 p.m., Kurobe Dam & Matsumoto Castle, $57 adults, $47 ages 6-11, $27 ages 4 & 5, $25 Blue Jacket; July 26, 4 a.m.-10 p.m., Mount Fuji climb, $42 ages 10+, free Blue Jacket; 7:30 a.m.-6 p.m., Mega Dinosaur Exhibition & Kasai Rinkai Park, $35 adults, $25 ages 4-15, $15 ages 3 & younger, $20 Blue Jacket; July 31, 4:30-11 p.m., Hakone Kosui Fireworks & boat cruise, $50 adults, $40 ages 6-11, $30 ages 5 & younger, $25 Blue Jacket; Aug. 1, 7 a.m.-8:30 p.m., Takasaki festival & sightseeing, $48 adults, $38 ages 5-11, $28 ages 4 & younger; 7 a.m.-5:30 p.m., Mother Farm, $39 adults, $29 ages 4-12, $17 ages 3 & younger; Aug. 2, 7 a.m.-7:30 p.m., Eastern Izu sightseeing & Izu Shaboten Park, $45 adults, $38 ages 6-12, $28 ages 3-5; 7:30 a.m.-9:30 p.m., Canyoning at Minakami, $115 ages 13+; 3-9:30 p.m., baseball: Yokohama DeNA BayStars vs. Hanshin Tigers; Aug. 12, noon-12:30 p.m., Mount Fuji climbing safety brief; Aug. 15, 7:30 a.m.-6:30 p.m., Tokyo sightseeing, $45 adults, $30 ages 6-11, $25 ages 5 & younger; 8 a.m.-5:30 p.m., Hakkeijima Sea Paradise, $15. 
CAMP FUJI Marine and Family Services, 224-8624 July 7. 10:30-11:30 a.m., Create A Spending Plan; July 8, 10:30-11:30 a.m., Marine Corps COOL Program; July 9, 10:30-11:30 a.m., Military Tuition Assistance Brief; Thu., 2-3 p.m., Military Tuition Assistance Brief; Fri., 9 a.m.-noon & 1-4 p.m., Dantes Testing. MCCS Trips and Recreation, 224-8657 July 5, 9 a.m.-5 p.m., Fuji Lakes and Cave trip; First Fri. of every month, 5:30-9:30 p.m., Kogen buffet shuttle; Fri. in July & August, Mount Fuji night climbing shuttle; Wed., 5:30-9:30 p.m. hot spring trip; Fri., 5:30 p.m., New Sanno Hotel shuttle run. 
SASEBO Outdoor Adventure Center, 252-3500 July 3, 17 & 24, 5-6 p.m., mandatory Mount Fuji information clinics, free; July 5 & Aug. 2, 5-6 p.m., sailing club meetings; July 18-19, 8 a.m.-5 p.m., Mount Kuju overnight hike, $60 includes guide, tent and sleeping bag, $135 includes lodging, access to the hot spring, dinner and breakfast, mandatory pre-trip; July 31-Aug. 2, Mount Fuji hike, $20, register by July 20, Level 5. Travel & Tours (single or unaccompanied military), 252-3433 July 4, Greenland Amusement Park, $60 ages 14+, $53 ages 6-13, $45 ages 5 & younger; July 5, 11 a.m.-4 p.m., Stancenation Japan G Edition Car Show at Huis Ten Bosch, 1,000 yen, 800 yen with military ID, free shuttle departs at Fleet Fitness Complex 1:30 a.m., noon & 3:35 p.m., register at Travel & Tours; July 5, Nagasaki Penguin Aquarium, $28 adults, $24 ages 4-12, $22 ages 3 & younger, $4 LBJ; July 11, food replica making & Moo Moo Land Aburayama. 
YOKOSUKA On Facebook: tinyurl.com/yzd4tqn Independence Day Events July 3, 9 a.m., Firecracker Color Run, $20; 3-8:30 p.m., Independence Day Celebration; 3-4 p.m., Chili Cook-Off Entries accepted; 4-6 p.m., petting zoo & pony rides, Kosano Park; 4-4:30 p.m., Water War, Main Stage Front; 4:30-5 p.m., Egg Roulette, Main Stage Front; 5:30-6 p.m., Lip Sync Battle, Main Stage; 6:30-8 p.m., Vintage Halen, Main Stage; 8:05-8:10 p.m., American Nation Anthem, Recreation Bay; 8:10-8:30 p.m., Fireworks at Recreation Bay.
